---

# IAGAI Skillset: Senior Multi-Lang Dev (Top 10)

## Use order (default)

1. `skills/iagai-workflow`
2. `skills/repo-orientation` (fast, parallel context loading)
3. implement + refactor
4. `skills/test-authoring`
5. `skills/security-review`
6. `skills/performance-triage`

## The 10 skills

1. `skills/iagai-workflow`
2. `skills/repo-orientation`
3. `skills/change-planning`
4. `skills/test-authoring`
5. `skills/security-review`
6. `skills/performance-triage`
7. `skills/ci-failure-triage`
8. `skills/dependency-upgrade`
9. `skills/mcp-builder`
10. `skills/incident-response`
